tool_description: This API shows the latest news on climate change
name: Mei Climate Change
title: Mei Climate Change

api_list.name: GET individual News Source
api_list.description: This endpoint gets news about climate from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mei-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/climate/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mei-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mei-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/climate/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mei-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Climate Change
